titles.title: AI Workforce PREPARE Act
AI Workforce PREPARE Act
AI Workforce Projections, Research, and Evaluations to Promote AI Readiness and Employment Act

A bill to better forecast and plan for the impact of artificial intelligence on the workforce of the United States, to provide data to improve training programs for in-demand industry sectors and occupations, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
